glosses: second-person singular (“your”) possessive form of dil in the ablative case.
third-person singular (“his/her/its”) possessive form of dil in the ablative case.

examples.text:
»Müslüman, diğer Müslümanların, elinden ve dilinden zarar görmediği kimsedir.«
»The Muslim is somebody from whom other Muslims are safe.« (Prophet Muhammad)
